entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
